_dependencyComments.grpc-web: support the ability to communicate with gRPC services from a web browser, depended on by protoc-gen-grpc-web, like axios
_dependencyComments.google-protobuf: protobuf library for JavaScript, depended on by protoc-gen-js, like JSON.parse
_dependencyComments.protoc-gen-js: generate pure js data code from proto files
_dependencyComments.@bufbuild/protoc-gen-es: plugin of @bufbuild/buf, generate ES module code from proto files
_dependencyComments.@bufbuild/protobuf: protobuf runtime for JavaScript, handles the serialization and deserialization of protobuf messages
_dependencyComments.@connectrpc/connect: Connect RPC library for JavaScript, provides the core functionality for making RPC calls without the specific transport layer
_dependencyComments.@connectrpc/connect-web: Connect RPC library for JavaScript, provides the transport layer for making RPC calls in a web browser
